titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Iminodisuccinate.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Iminodisuccinate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2011, the suspension of duty on certain mixtures of sodium salts of iminodisuccinic acid (Iminodisuccinate).
